看了评论和游戏测评之后带着极大的期望值开始游戏，没想到剧情平淡如水，打着哈欠玩了10个小时，最后实在玩不下去了，线性叙事剧情、重复的敌人、糟糕的射击手感...都戳中了我的毒点。伊丽莎白是很可爱，冲这个怎么说也值得一个好评，但是游戏带给我的失望实在是一言难尽。纠结的给了一个不推荐，只能说这款游戏不适合我吧。

i Still think about how awful this game was and i played it over two years ago now. sometimes i remember it and just get angry, this game is so bad in every story element, in the theme of the game, in the pacing, this game is bad!! I care about Nothing it had to offer me! They act like you and Elizabeth are fighting to escape two bad sides here but one is just Vile! and acting like they dont care about either part they still both just seem like awful people and yet the game still praises them (or at least elizabeth) at every turn. 

Choice has no part in this game which is BIZARRE to me because the whole point of the first two games is that your choice to be kind has value! Choice is meant to be important in this series and yet the only two things you can choose in this game are whether or not to kill a racist old general so he can avoid prison and have a ''''soldiers death'''', and what fucking necklace elizabeth gets to wear. neither affect the plot in Any way whatsoever. they're barely even mentioned again, save for that you get to see the general in a prison and he doesnt talk to you if you spare him. the only reason they're there is to pretend this game is important.

dont bother with this game, seriously. there are two good things about this game that you can get anywhere else. two good things in a mountainous pile of shit

Отличный шутер, который определённо достоин внимания. Прекрасная стрельба, отличный сюжет, виртуозные анимации и хорошо прописанное взаимодействие персонажей с миром стоят каждой минуты, проведённой в этой прекрасной игре.

 Ах да! Лучший второстепенный персонаж в игровой индустрии прилагается!

This games is great !
Here is a simple explaination of the game story that's spoiler free (I'm a genius so believe me it's 100% accurate)

So you play Booker Dewitt, the inventor of bookmaking and as a result you fell into crumbling debts and got hired by some folks to find a child named Elizabeth (she later turns out to be Elizabeth the 1st, queen of England). 
You later discover that the child you're trying to save possesses uncanny abilities: she can travel through space and time and she can also cook KFC's Hot Wings to perfection. Unfortunately for you, the leader of Columbia (the fictional city, not the country), Mr Something Comstock, is after Colonel Sanders' secret recipe, that's why he wants to capture THE GIRL.
Oh and btw there is also a insurrection led by the Vox Populi because they want the Colonel's secret recipe to be shared to the people and without racial discrimination (that's called a utopia btw).

At the end of the game Booker Dewitt, realizing the destructive power that is held within the RECIPE, kills Elizabeth to save the world and also Macdonalds for whom he was working all along. Comstock retires from being a segregational b*stard and turns to gender studies. 
Also, no one cared about the trivial matter of Elizabeth defying the laws of physics.

rich store

Going to be honest. As enjoyable as a game this is on its own, it's not Bioshock. It's a corridor shooter, no real puzzles, and no real planning needed. Just regenerate your health behind cover and then kill the baddies. The old games had resources for health and plasmids and ammo that you needed to use wisely, but here it's just gun down everyone. As a standalone game, it's good. But trying to fit into the Bioshock games, it's standing next to some games that were different, while itself feels like Call of Duty. I'm sorry I had to write a review like this, but just seeing how Bioshock was and then how it became and then get all this praise for just being another generic shooter really isn't good.

买来当天就通关了啊....

------------------全成就难度评测------------------
难度：比较困难
耗时(h)：50+
繁琐度：一般
是否肝：一般
是否使用mod(修改器)：否
是否有成就损坏：否
是否需要多周目：是（正常情况下）
是否有联机成就：否

要点：各成就都可以参照网上的攻略指南，最难的地方在于蓝带挑战，建议多次完成同一大关的不同蓝带挑战。
PS：本体剧情实为顶级水平，但是dlc剧情不尽如人意，编剧发屠龙宝刀，开启dlc前建议做好心理准备。

İlk iki oyuna göre çok ta üzerine koymadığını düşündüğüm bir oyun. Bu sizi ne kadar oyundan soğutur bilmem. Beni pekte soğutmadı. Yaklaşık olarak 12 saat kadar uzun olan bir oynanışı var. Eğer hikayeyi dibine kadar öğrenmek istiyorsanız biraz haritada gezinmeniz gerekir. Atmosfer yine bioshock serisinin diğerleri gibi üst düzey. Müzikler muazzam. Farklı ve orijinal bir hikaye ancak anlatımı size garip gelebilir. Ben çok beğenerek oynadım. Tavsiye ederim. Bioshock serisinin tamamını anlayarak bitirin.  Arkasında sizi farklı düşünmeye itecek felsefeler olabilir.

I like it. Bioshock Infinite have good story and plot twist almost as good as first one.The combat is a okay in more bigger level area than previous titles, tho its not as good as Bioshock 2.

The multiverse mumbo jumbo had made some plot hole in story. Multiverse theory is an interesting part of story but if its not exlpained well, it became meh.

Overall, a pretty good story and a well gameplay mechanics. Something I totally love in it are the design of Columbia and Rapture before the crazy shit happens.

Vstiahol ma príbeh, gameplay a vlastne celá hra...
